title: Life is Hard... Here's How to Make it Easier
itunes:title: Life is Hard... Here's How to Make it Easier
description:
Hard work is hard, but so is being broke. Working out is hard, but so is being overweight. Life is always hard at some point - it is either hard now and easy later or easy now and hard later. In this episode, I am going to teach you how to work hard now so that life can be as easy as possible in your future.

 

Follow me on IG for more inspiration here: https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

If you live in the US/Canada and you want to receive motivational texts from me, text me now at 1-512-580-9305 or click here https://my.community.com/robdial

 

Thank you to our sponsor:

BetterHelp: Visit BetterHelp.com/DIAL to receive 10% OFF your first month!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
